org.drip.util.common
Class FIGen

java.lang.Object
  org.drip.util.common.FIGen

public class FIGen
extends java.lang.Object

FIGen contains the collection of the static generic utility functions used by the internal and external DRIP modules

GenerateLossPeriods

public static final java.util.List<ProductLossPeriodCurveMeasures> GenerateLossPeriods(CreditComponent comp,
                                                                                       ValuationParams valParams,
                                                                                       PricerParams pricerParams,
                                                                                       Period period,
                                                                                       double dblWorkoutDate,
                                                                                       ComponentMarketParams mktParams)
Creates a set of loss period measures

Parameters:
comp - Component for which the measures are to be generated
valParams - ValuationParams from which the periods are generated
pricerParams - PricerParams that control the generation characteristics
period - The enveloping coupon period
dblWorkoutDate - Double JulianDate representing the absolute end of all the generated periods
mktParams - ComponentMarketParams that contain the discount and the credit curves
Returns:
List of the generated ProductLossPeriodCurveMeasures

Returns:
True if parsing is successful

                                                                                         java.lang.String strRecordDelimiter,
                                                                                         boolean bSkipNullValue,
                                                                                         java.lang.String strNULLString)

Parameters:

strRecordDelimiter - Record delimiter string
bSkipNullValue - Indicates whether NULL Values are to be skipped
strNULLString - NULL string
Returns:
[String, double] map
